reviews.sentence: Good location but needs updating. Had a last minute trip to Sydney and this was the only reasonably priced pl available. Since I had been to Chatswod previously this seemed like a good location to stay. As a hotel apartment it is good as you have cooking and laundry facilities. However the room I stayed in was looking a bit tired hence the average score. Location wise it was literally across the road from the train station very handy for getting into the city. Also Chatswod has many dining options and shopping is a short walk away. If you happen to drive there is reasonable parking located on the street.
Just comfortable and awesome. The apartment style rooms to acomodate a small familyits location to facilities trains etc.

Great location great facilities quiet and comfy. Highly recommend. Very close to train station and shops. Great location very quiet. Hotel facilities are great and rooms are spacious and comfortable. I would stay again and again.

Overnight at the Mantra Chatswod NSW 21st April 2017. Great location especially for us as our granddaughter held her 21st birthday party at The Avenue directly opposite the hotel. Shops also handy for last minute shopping. Rooms very well equipped and spotless. Great range of tea coffees etc in kitchen and toiletries in bathroom and beds comfortable. Looking forward to staying again on our next visit to Sydney from Canberra. Excellent service from staff both at reception and in rooms. Morning buffet breakfast could be improved perhaps more supervision of bain maries to ensure food is kept warm and fresh.

Food somewhat disappointing Accommodation excellent. The Quality of Service was wonderful room was great however I did not enjoy any of the meals I received. I am quite a fussy eater and vegetarian. I found that each of the meals courses I received were without flavour. I had pasta on the first night and while very edible it was flavourless. Night 2 I had the arancini balls and pizza. Arancini was without season and flavour and the Pizza was absolutely terrible unsure what one of the vegetables were but yuck. Needless to say I did not eat it. Breakfast on day 1 did not arrive although I am fairly sure it was my fault as I am not confident that I ticked a time. Day 2 breakfast as soft poached eggs and hash browns. The hash browns were potato gems not hash browns and the poached eggs were very undercoked. I did not eat it. Lastly the handle to the hot tap in room 416 needs review as it fell off when I was adjusting the water. Overall I think the accommodation is great staff are courteous helpful and friendly. I will certanly stay there and recommend to the hotel to others. I just will not eat there again.

Little bit dated big room. Stayed here on business as the location is convenient for my office. The reception area is nice enough and friendly staff. I had booked a king bed and was disappointed with 2 singles. The room decor is very dated the room was very spacious though. Downside was my TV did not work at all would not even turn on and my tap in the bathroom dripped constantly which was really annoying. Upsides were a very well equipped room including mini kitchen laundry and hair dryer etc. Convenient for Chatswod station into the city. Would stay here again for work for the convenience and because I am not paying. but would not book for a personal trip.
Excellent location and comfortable stay. Big rooms and good gym and pool. All good.

Great location average facility. Location is very good close to chatswod station and westfieldStaf were nice made a call about missing plug came up in 2 minsThe facility is rather average you can hear people talking through the wall if they are loud no power point by the bed making charging your phone a nightmareThe room had a balcony but no sunshineBath tub is small and can only fit 1 personOveral I would only recommend if the rate is competitiveLocationFacility power point next the bed please.

mantra. great location close to all amenities and to the city. all staff were friendly and helpful nothing was a problem. My room was clean and very comfortable. Parking was ample and easy to access. Thank you. I will definitely stay again.

Location location location. Comfy bed and pillows bathroom plumbing needs some work as does tv reception for free to view channels. Great to have full kitchen facilities and opening windows and balcony aces40 per night for bedding for foldout sofa in lounge was a little steep.

Family weekend away. The amenities at the Mantra was of a high standard. The room was comfortable and very clean. The bed was perfect ensuring us a great sleep. The situation at Chatswod puts us within walking distance to restaurants cafes shopping and public transport. Great place to stay.

Spacious rooms. Mantra Chatswod has basically all the things you need in a place. It has a well functioning laundry place a basic kitchen and gym. The thing I like about the property is its close proximity to restaurants mall and grocery stores like Woolworths and Coles. It is also very close to the train and bus stations.
Nice Hotel and good location. Good BUT the lifts in this hotel are very problematic. Really need to overhaul those control panels and buttons.

Old and dirty 1. All the carpet and sofa needs to change2. Upgrade the air conditioning. no heating or cooling and noisy 3. The walkway needs to clean well from lift to rom4. The cafe restaurant staff need more training5. Lobby seating area needs to keep cleaning I wanted to seat and wait for someone and was messy and leaves on the floor. If I am looking for hotel I pass by and see messy lobby I wo n’t go in. Personally opinion.

It was Ok. Positives Friendly staff great location and rooms were clean. Negatives Hotel needs an urgent refurbishment particularly the carpets in the foyer hallways and rooms. Gym needs new and better equipment. They say first impressions count and that is what is letting your hotel down.

Disappointing Mantra. When I got back to the room after an evening out there were no tea bags in the room neither TV remote worked in the room and then only one elevator worked which the workers took over so it kept skipping the ground floor so I waited for 10 minutes to get back to the car park.

Gave me the space i needed. Lots of space in the room. Everything clean. The rooms are outdated. I do nt like climbing over the bath to shower. The hallway on level 2 was incredibly uneven. Its due for renovation.

Mantra Chatswod needs total renovation. Everything in this hotel is old. From the lobby to lift and room. As soon as we entered the room strong damp smell is up our nose. Very disappointed. Glad that we are staying only one night.

Lovely Room fantastic staff good food they are improving. I checked in early 11 am knowing my room might not be ready but they said it was only to go up find is was not ready but received a complimentary bottle of red wine when it was finally ready at 2 pm bonusThey were doing renovation work on one of the floors so the lift floors were always dirty but that can be forgiven my room had a very new carpet almost chemical smell but I was able to air it with the window open. but the tragedy what I was really looking forward to was the spa in the gym. It did n’t work. No bubbles or hot jets of water to ease aches just tub of warm water with sandy bits at the bottom ☹ ️.
Good Location and availabilty. The facilities are getting a bit dated. Appreciating that renovations looked like they were being done.

Checking in. THis must be the only hotel accommodation I have stayed that does not have a parking space for checking in only spot out front was loading zone and in the 4 minutes it took to check in I was booked 191 seriously angry. Man at reception tried hard to make me feel better and upgraded my room I still have 191 to pay. Create a parking space.
No issues pleasant people at reception. No issues pleasant people at reception.

A good unit in a convenient location. The apartment was a good size. The laundry facilities are an added benefit. Lift access to security parking is also advantageous and the kitchen is large and well supplied. A long mirror in the bedroom rather than the hallway would seem more appropriate.

Well located. Very convenient with the overnight parking. The hotel is in a great location with friendly reception staff. I purposely booked this hotel as was on crutches visiting a surgeon following a huge operation 3 months ago. I booked the hotel due to the pool and the gym so I could do my pool rehab and few minutes on the bike after travelling 6 hours. The gym equipment needs some maintenance to it as some of it is dangerous in the state it is currently in. I make this comment with knowledge as I own and manage my own gym and have been in the industry for 25 years. To be honest the pool is very cold and noisy and therefor not an inviting experience. The hot tub was nice and hot. We wanted to eat in the hotel restaurant that night however as we attempted to go we were informed by reception staff that it was closed on Sunday nights. The sign says open 7 days I now realise on Sunday it is obviously only for breakfast or lunchThere were plenty of food options over the road. None of this feedback is negative. you asked for feedback so I am providing it. I need to see the surgeon again in a month and will book this hotel again for the same reasons I did the first time.
